name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, allowing the creation of interactive UIs and reusable components.

name: Java
description: A high-level, object-oriented programming language used for building robust applications across various platforms.

name: Next.js
description: A React-based framework for building fast, SEO-friendly web applications with server-side rendering capabilities.

name: HTML
description: The standard markup language for creating web pages, providing structure and layout for web content.

name: CSS
description: A style sheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML, controlling layout and design.

name: JavaScript
description: A versatile programming language primarily used in web development to add interactive features to websites.

name: Node.js
description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine, allowing developers to build scalable server-side applications.
